name: NoSignal
description:
This is my first game, i started learning Game-Development amid the global lockdown and this is what i made! :) I have to add a cutscene to explain the story of the game but here it is put in a simple way  (if you're curious) "A Police Officer cannot get signal to contact his precinct , help him as he travels in his car to great lengths to find a signal!!", I have add some more things too  , i'll update it here soon ;) 

I hope you have as much fun while playing it as i had while making it!!
